items.sentence: Eat, drink, and be merry, for tomorrow we die.
We have lots of water, but it isn't drinkable.
Let's not discuss this until I've had a drink.
Did you drink the drink that Tom made for you?
You shouldn't drink coffee this late at night.
Columbus' discovery of America was accidental.
Tom went to Boston and came back a week later.
Tom was maybe thirteen years old at that time.
Tom says that he's interested in volunteering.
Tom lets his kids do whatever they want to do.
